Text saved: Chloe came home from school.
She made a cup of coffee.
She took it to her bedroom.
She had homework to do.
But she wanted to wait.

Her parents were not home yet.

Her parents would talk.
The TV would be on.
Her dad would listen to jazz music.
He liked jazz very much.
He would cook dinner.
Chloe liked this time of day.
She could play with her pet rats.
